Constructor Detail

init

public init(string unfuddleUrl, string username, string password, [boolean debug='false'], [numeric timeout='5'], [string apiversion='v1'], [string curlPath='c:\curl\curl.exe'])
Psuedo constructor that allows us to play our object games.

Parameters:
unfuddleUrl - The Unfuddle URL to use.
username - The Unfuddle Username to use.
password - The Unfuddle Password to use.
debug - Whether or not to output debugging information to cf debugging, and collects the raw xml in the temp directory.
timeout - The timeout on http calls.
apiversion - The version of the api to call.
curlPath - The path to the curl.exe
Method Detail

public query addCommentToTicket(any project, numeric ticketId, string body)
Adds a new comment to a ticket

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the component to
ticketId - the ticket id
body - The body of the comment

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the component to
name - The name of the component to add

Adds a new comment to a ticket

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the component to
fieldNumber - The ID of the custom field that you are adding the value into
value - The value of the custom field

addFileToTicket

public void addFileToTicket(any project, numeric ticketId, string filePath, string contentType)

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the milestone to
ticketId - The id of the ticket that the file is being uploaded into
filePath - full path to the file to be uploaded
contentType - MIME File Type

addMilestone

public query addMilestone(any project, string title, date dueOn, [numeric personResponsibleId='0'], [boolean archived='false'], [boolean completed='false'])
Adds a new milestone

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the milestone to
title - The title of the milestone to add
dueOn - The date that the milestone is due on
personResponsibleId - The id person that is responsible for the milestone
archived - boolean flag if the milestone is archived or not
completed - boolean flag if the milestone is completed or not

addPerson

public query addPerson(string username, string email, string firstName, string lastName, [boolean isAdministrator='false'], [string notificationFrequency='immediate'], [boolean notificationIgnoreSelf='true'], [string notificationScopeMessages='all'], [string notificationScopeMilestones='all'], [string notificationScopeSource='all'], [string notificationScopeTickets='involved'], [string timeZone])
Adds a new person to the account

Parameters:
username
email
firstName
lastName
isAdministrator
notificationFrequency - immediate, 30mins, hourly, dailyam, dailypm, never
notificationIgnoreSelf - true, false
notificationScopeMessages - all, none
notificationScopeMilestones - all, none
notificationScopeSource - all, none
notificationScopeTickets - all, involved, none
timeZone - Defaults to the account time zone, otherwise just pass in the string of the time zone

addPersonToProject

public query addPersonToProject(any project, numeric personId, [boolean isAdministrator='false'], [string messages='readcreate'], [string milestones='read'], [string notebooks='manage'], [string people='read'], [string source='read'], [string tickets='readcreate'])
Adds a person to a project

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the version to
personId - The ID of the person to add to the project
isAdministrator
messages - none, read, readcreate, manage
milestones - none, read, manage
notebooks - none, read, manage
people - none, read, invite, manage
source - none, read, commit
tickets - none, read, create, readcreate, manage

addSeverity

public query addSeverity(any project, string name)
Adds a new severity

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the milestone to
name - The name of the severity to add

addTicket

public query addTicket(any project, [string summary='new'], [string description=''], [numeric priority='1'], [numeric componentId='0'], [string descriptionFormat='plain'], [date dueOn], [numeric milestoneId='0'], [string resolution=''], [string resolutionDescription=''], [string resolutionDescriptionFormat='plain'], [numeric severityId='0'], [string status='new'], [numeric versionId='1'], [numeric hoursEstimateCurrent='0'], [numeric hoursEstimateInitial='0'], [numeric field1ValueId='0'], [numeric field2ValueId='0'], [numeric field3ValueId='0'], [numeric assigneeId='0'])
updates an existing ticket

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the milestone to
summary - Ticket summary / subject
description - The description of the ticket
priority - The ID of the priority (1-5) 1 being the lowest
componentId - The ID of the component
descriptionFormat - The format of the description
dueOn - The date that the ticket is due on
milestoneId - The ID of the milestone associated with the ticket
resolution - The resolution (fixed, works_for_me, postponed, duplicate, will_not_fix, invalid)
resolutionDescription - The resolution description
resolutionDescriptionFormat - The resolution description
severityId - The ID of the severity associated with the ticket
status - Status (new, unaccepted, reassigned, reopened, accepted, resolved, closed)
versionId - version id
hoursEstimateCurrent - current effort estimate in hours
hoursEstimateInitial - initial effort estimate in hours
field1ValueId - custom field id
field2ValueId - custom field id
field3ValueId - custom field id
assigneeId - id of the user that it is assigned to

addVersion

public query addVersion(any project, string name)
Adds a new version

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the version to
name - The name of the version to add

convertPostRequestToXML

private string convertPostRequestToXML(struct request='', string container)
Takes a post request structure and converts it to the XML form that Basecamp needs.

Parameters:
request - The request structure to transform.
container - The outside container XML

convertUnfuddleXMLToQuery

private query convertUnfuddleXMLToQuery(XML unfuddleXML, string collection, [string root=''])
Converts the results from unfuddle into an ColdFusion query variable.

Parameters:
unfuddleXML - The unfuddle XML content.
collection - The name of the collection to loop over. If the xml structure is 'unfuddlexml.comments.comment',we are looking for 'comment'.
root - The root of the XML file, needed if collection is not the root.

convertunfuddleDateTime

private date convertunfuddleDateTime(string unfuddleTime)
Converts unfuddle time to a ColdFusion date time variable.

Parameters:
unfuddleTime - The unfuddle formatted date time.

path - Where to download the backup file to.
timeout - A timeout value for just this operation.

listAccountActivity

public query listAccountActivity([date start_date], [date end_date], [numeric limit='0'])
Get information about activity on the unfuddle account. It is limited by the permission of the requesting account.

Parameters:
start_date - Specifies the inclusive start date of the query
end_date - Specifies the inclusive start date of the query
limit - specifies the maximum number of results to return

makeHTTPGetRequest

private XML makeHTTPGetRequest(string urlToRequest, [struct request])
Encapsulates getting the requesting and parsing the Unfuddle results into an XML variable.

Parameters:
urlToRequest - The url to request the data from.
request - A structured post to send to Unfuddle API. Usually for creating items.

makeHTTPPostRequest

private XML makeHTTPPostRequest(string urlToRequest, [struct request], string container, [string httpMethod='post'], [string contentType='application/xml'], [string file])
Encapsulates getting the requesting and parsing the Basecamp results into an XML variable.

Parameters:
urlToRequest - The url to request the data from.
request - A structured post to send to Unfuddle API. Usually for creating items.
container - The outside container XML
httpMethod - The HTTP method (post or put)
contentType - This should be application/xml for regular posts OR application/octet-stream for file uploads
file -

returnAllSubKeys

private array returnAllSubKeys(any array, [string collection=''])
Takes an Array of structures, and returns a list of all keys.

Parameters:
array - The array of structures to parse.
collection - The collection type to parse.

public void updateMilestone(any project, numeric mileStoneId, string title, date dueOn, [numeric personResponsibleId='0'], [boolean archived='false'], [boolean completed='false'])
updates a milestone

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the version to
mileStoneId - The milestone id to update
title - The title of the milestone to add
dueOn - The date that the milestone is due on
personResponsibleId - The id person that is responsible for the milestone
archived - boolean flag if the milestone is archived or not
completed - boolean flag if the milestone is completed or not

updateSeverity

public void updateSeverity(any project, numeric severityId, string name)
updates a severity

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the version to
severityId - The id of the severity that is being updated
name - The name of the severity to be updated

updateTicket

public query updateTicket(any project, numeric ticketId, [string summary='new'], [string description=''], [numeric priority='1'], [numeric componentId='0'], [string descriptionFormat='plain'], [date dueOn], [numeric milestoneId='0'], [string resolution=''], [string resolutionDescription=''], [string resolutionDescriptionFormat='plain'], [numeric severityId='0'], [string status='new'], [numeric versionId='1'], [numeric hoursEstimateCurrent='0'], [numeric hoursEstimateInitial='0'])
Adds a new ticket

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the milestone to
ticketId - The id of the ticket that is being updated
summary - Ticket summary / subject
description - The description of the ticket
priority - The ID of the priority (1-5) 1 being the lowest
componentId - The ID of the component
descriptionFormat - The format of the description
dueOn - The date that the ticket is due on
milestoneId - The ID of the milestone associated with the ticket
resolution - The resolution (fixed, works_for_me, postponed, duplicate, will_not_fix, invalid)
resolutionDescription - The resolution description
resolutionDescriptionFormat - The resolution description
severityId - The ID of the severity associated with the ticket
status - Status (new, unaccepted, reassigned, reopened, accepted, resolved, closed)
versionId - version id
hoursEstimateCurrent - current effort estimate in hours
hoursEstimateInitial - initial effort estimate in hours

updateVersion

public void updateVersion(any project, numeric versionId, string name)
Updates an existing version

Parameters:
project - The project id for which to add the version to
versionId - The id of the version that is being updates
name - The name of the version
